website_summaries.verdict: This super-affordable tire gauge fits easily into a toolbox or glove compartment, and offers an easy one-button operation.
pros: Back-lit display very easy to read
Multiple measuring options, not just PSI
Generous 150 pound PSI capacity for the price
cons: Digital display shuts off after a few seconds

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to change batteries
customer_reviews.text: So, I used this once. It seemed to work well. However, the 2nd time I went to use it, the gauge was dead. I presumed it was the battery. There are two screws on the back. I thought that if I removed them, the two plastic pieces would open to reveal the battery. Wrong! I could not separate the two pieces of plastic. In a futile 10 minutes of frustration, I threw the thing in the garbage. My suggestion: Stop buying this Chinese crap, pay $10 more, and have a thing last longer than a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Jpop237

customer_reviews.title: Good little gadget
customer_reviews.text: This product works as advertised - I think it's accurate, but have not been able to really check yet. I used it the day after it got delivered and I got a flat tire. It was easy to use and the lights were great to have since it was night-time. It was a little tricky to get it just right on the valve stem at first try, but after a couple of seconds it was no problem when I got used to using it. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: consumer

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: Unit works correctly. Only problem is it’s very easy to tap the only button on the unit and change it’s mode/reading. I almost over filled my tires thinking I was on PSI and was not. So just pay attention to your modes, watch out for the button and all works well.
customer_reviews.author: Jnx

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Like the replaceable battery - old one didn't so it is now in the trash. Light is nice, especially at night/poorly illuminated garages. The multiple scales is a pain, I only use PSI and every time i press the button it wants to scroll through the other three scales.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: It’s such a simple effective tool to have. A must for older model drivers that don’t have the luxury of their car telling them which tire is not properly inflated. The device is super lightweight and easy to use. Lights up bright to easily read in any conditions. Ordered myself one and then had to order more for jealous coworkers.
customer_reviews.author: Jiggs2k2

customer_reviews.title: Works well and like the color
customer_reviews.text: This works well. I had another digital tire guage, but lost it in an accident. This has all the same functional readings, is easy to operate and seems pretty reliable. I am pleased with it and like the color. I'd purchase again if needed. It will get q lot of use because my new-to-me 2009 jeep has its tire sensor gauge on permanently.
customer_reviews.author: MsBunny

customer_reviews.title: Item had horrible readings
customer_reviews.text: Item didn't work well at lower pressures. My fat tire bike rides at ~20PSI, this device could not read anything around 15-25 psi. Over inflated my tires trying to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a few months
customer_reviews.text: It seemed to work well when it worked. Then it abruptly stopped working after a few months. Unscrewed it to change the battery but it is not built to facilitate a battery change. It is possible to change the battery but it isn't worth it given the low cost of the item and relative effort involved to change the battery.
customer_reviews.author: NC Transplant

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Not even two months old and stopped working. Put it on valve stem and it starts going crazy, blinking and throwing odd numbers off
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Need a tire gauge? This one is really nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for each of our cars and they work great. The light and the backlit screen are big pluses. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Madtown Cuistôt

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Much better than a mechanical tire gauge. I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Glynn Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal for the Price
customer_reviews.text: It's a great size, the lighted screen is helpful. I usually only use PSI so I wish there was a way to set it to that and keep it there. It's a bit annoying to have to cycle through them every time.
customer_reviews.author: Taldak

customer_reviews.title: good product. Accuracy is dubious
customer_reviews.text: Once you get the hang of it is quick and easy. However, if you check the accuracy against another Gage they seem to differ a bit. I don't know which one is right..
customer_reviews.author: GrandPa  G

customer_reviews.title: Simple and convienient
customer_reviews.text: It works accurately every time. The light is a big plus for dark areas and the read-out is clear. Although not industrial, this meter works great for household use.
customer_reviews.author: Gunner

customer_reviews.title: Quit working, I soldered a wire back on to fix the problem
customer_reviews.text: Quit working after 1 use, the wire to the push button wasn’t soldered well. That’s no big deal for me, I just soldered it back, and it works again.
customer_reviews.author: goldenhawk

customer_reviews.title: junk
customer_reviews.text: worked first time and stopped working second time 2 weeks later
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD FONG

customer_reviews.title: Works great .
customer_reviews.text: Works great and i check it a few times withy expensive motionpro fancy one it was .25 off so pretty happy and also easy to use. Bought 2 of them ine in tool box other in my ride !
customer_reviews.author: J5

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, pleasant to look at. It's great for this price. The only critique i can pass is that the start button feels very flimsy and cheap. That being said, considering the price and precision it delivers- it is of great value.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Works great, nice to have just Incase in your purse. I got this for a stocking stuffer and I use it all the time! Especially living in the Midwest and having weather that goes from hot to cold so quick. Gives me piece of mind when my tire pressure light comes on!
customer_reviews.author: Liz a.

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Buy this! By far the best air gauge I’ve used. Excellent value multiple pressure values metric and ASE
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Best gage ever it lights up
customer_reviews.text: I love the light so you can see the tire pressure at night. It is accurate and durable. Battery is still going strong after ~1 year!
customer_reviews.author: M. James

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to select pressure reading light weight blue back light makes it easy to see result at night and day blue light at the end just enough light and not harsh like a white light
customer_reviews.author: Todd F. FAIR, HONEST REVIEWS

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and reads accurately
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my dad, he loves it. Easy to use and works as intended with an accurate reading. Glad we went to digital finally
customer_reviews.author: Cara Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Nice product!
customer_reviews.text: Made of good material quality, this is a very well-made, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: OzzieVald

customer_reviews.title: Great device a good price
customer_reviews.text: High quality materials, great style, easy to use, easy to understand its information. Very good seller, reliable, I highly reccomend it.
customer_reviews.author: HBM

customer_reviews.title: I like this one
customer_reviews.text: This is a very handy tool that you should always keep in your glove compartment.
customer_reviews.author: Adnan Y

customer_reviews.title: A handy litttle tool
customer_reviews.text: Great for checking tire pressures in just about every thing around the house. I received 2 in the package and gave one to my neighbor he loves his.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Nice little gauge.
customer_reviews.text: Love the lighted tip and ease of this thing. I only use PSI, but if I needed other measurements they are there also. Simple, affordable, and accurate...that's what I was looking for. Smaller than I expected and fits in the glove box easily with other things.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and read. Tested against 2 other testers and they all were within .1 of each other.
customer_reviews.author: Kato2k

customer_reviews.title: User friendly
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to use and digital display was easy to read
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Gerhand

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is very easy to use. Within seconds I had it "plugged in" to the tire with a PSI reading. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: M.D.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work with bikes that have presta valves.
customer_reviews.text: As I stated above, the part that recieves the valve stem doesn't accomodate valve stems that have presta valves. This is irritating because it doesn't state this anywhere in the description and it shows a bicycle which commonly have presta valves.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Just about perfect. Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Just about perfect. Easy to use, the LED light is great for night time use. We'll see how the battery life is, but the unit is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pluta

customer_reviews.title: Good value, works good, delivered as promised
customer_reviews.text: living in the era of “slow leakers”, its good to have a digital pressure gage in your car. so far, works good, good value, delivered to me with no problems
customer_reviews.author: JoeSmo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool
customer_reviews.text: Ergonomically comfortable to use. Accurate readings. Easy on and off.
customer_reviews.author: tlow

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use and easy to read, especially at night. Excellent value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M. Berry

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Solid well built design easy to use and stores away without using allot of space, seems consistent with multiple psi readings, recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Bill B

customer_reviews.title: Much easier to read than a standard pressure gauge and ...
customer_reviews.text: Much easier to read than a standard pressure gauge and has been consistent (although with a slightly different) with the gauge on my air chuck.
customer_reviews.author: Greg D

customer_reviews.title: The gauge worked better than I thought it would
customer_reviews.text: Received my tire pressure gauge in two days. The gauge worked better than I thought it would. Bright blue light. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work at all.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with no battery. Understand, it’s not designed for you to replace the battery, and there is no indication what size to use.
customer_reviews.author: Michael s

customer_reviews.title: I will always purchase from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I love this tire gauge it's easy to use and it is lightweight and it reads accurate reading
customer_reviews.author: Darrell P.

customer_reviews.title: EASY
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice tire gauge, so much easier to use. Safelife is a good company, their service and products are very good.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Lane

customer_reviews.title: Used to obsessively check air pressure on a Onewheel
customer_reviews.text: Yay! Now I can check my air pressure 10 times a day and have a accurate baseline. Easy to read and use.
customer_reviews.author: Kalani Nicholls

customer_reviews.title: so not easy to find in a dark tool cabinet
customer_reviews.text: It's black, so not easy to find in a dark tool cabinet. But the led display is large so it's easy to read. Let's see how long it lasts though since this one and many, many others are made in China
customer_reviews.author: sky

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The light for changing tires in the dark. Easy to use and read.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie l.

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: This "handy" device is very accurate. and it was able to tell me how much psi i needed for my tires.
customer_reviews.author: Nate Rekant

customer_reviews.title: Super simple and great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to use and great grab for your car/truck.
customer_reviews.author: Dale casagrande

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad tire pressure gauge
customer_reviews.text: Is nice but sometimes it could get annoying since is temprimental sometimes it works and sometimes it doesn’t it just keeps blinking for no reason and then it will start working again
customer_reviews.author: Kary C

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works as told at a decent price. Helped me inflate my car tires and hopefully can try it on my bike tires towards the spring time

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Accurate
customer_reviews.text: This works great easy to use , easy to read . Its literally idiot proof it shuts itself off. Battery included. You should have one in your car m

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read and fast
customer_reviews.text: Easy to read and fast. My car tells you when a tire is low but not which one. Easy to use right out of the package.

customer_reviews.title: Quick and accurate
customer_reviews.text: Works great and is very handy. No more looking at a meter
customer_reviews.author: Peanut

customer_reviews.title: Great gauge, very good replacement, low price
customer_reviews.text: My previous digital gauge was fading out, and batteries cost almost as much as a new gauge! Great replacement

customer_reviews.title: so good!
customer_reviews.text: Only had it a couple days but so far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Skrap

customer_reviews.title: Easy Pressure Gauge
customer_reviews.text: Way easier to use than a traditional stick gauge. Pro: - Multiple pressure units available - Lights up for night use - Clear numbers...no more guessing! Cons: - Just like every pressure gauge, it needs to be lined up perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gauge for the price
customer_reviews.text: Best working gauge I've bought. Others have been a waste of money. Highly recommended.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've used it dozens of times and it works great. Accurate and simple to use.

customer_reviews.title: The product arrived with a dead battery inside. I ...
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived with a dead battery inside. I had to remove the screws and find the battery number, then drive to the store to purchase a replacement. Once I put the new battery in it did actually work. Otherwise I would have returned it.

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and long lasting. Also good queues on status of battery.

customer_reviews.title: Fast, easy, accurate

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: works perfectly and the light on the front is perfect. great product!

customer_reviews.title: Gets the Job Done

customer_reviews.text: This pressure gauge is easy to use. Takes accurate pressure readings. Digital display is easy to read.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product very helpful when finding the right amount of air pressure in my tires on my vehicle.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really nice unit, and more useful than a mechanical gauge (until the battery runs out).

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Super easy to use. Most of all. I can clearly see the digital display and k p.a. exactly how much air I need or If I need to let some out. I drive a lot and am on my own a lot as well. With this tool I can take care of issues as they arrive. It's a women friendly tool.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Ison

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect! Bonus is the LED light that makes it ...
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect! Bonus is the LED light that makes it easier to see in low light and darkness. Super lightweight, I bought the black one.

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy to read with insertion light and display ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great, easy to read with insertion light and display light. Has variety of measurement options which are easily selected.

customer_reviews.title: So impressed I purchased a 2nd one!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product! This is my 2nd purchase of the same one. I keep one in my truck, and one in my harley. Would definitely recommend (especially if you have oversized tires on your truck)

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Husband said slips off tire stem, sometimes shuts off to quickly. It does it’s job for what it cost.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: I have ordered a better quality one
customer_reviews.text: This gauge only lasted about two weeks, I checked maybe 12 tire's and it quit working, purched now batteries but it made no difference, I have ordered a better quality one.

customer_reviews.title: Was hoping for better....
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box it didn’t work. The LCD screen wasn’t displaying properly so I thought maybe it was weather related, so I let it sit at room temperature for a couple of hours. That still didn’t make a difference so back it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Slaby

customer_reviews.title: Arrived defective. 9 times out of 10 when pushing ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived defective. 9 times out of 10 when pushing the power button, nothing would happen. When it did "turn on", it would simply blink the display over and over until it turned off again.
customer_reviews.author: D.S.

customer_reviews.title: Might not turn on.
customer_reviews.text: Would not turn on. Had battery but would never light up.
customer_reviews.author: Harold R Smith

customer_reviews.title: NO!
customer_reviews.text: This thing didn't turn on. Definitely returned and bought a better one from another company on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Sweets

customer_reviews.title: Well worth having
customer_reviews.text: I like the backlighting and easy read screen. I've tested the accuracy with 2 other gauges, and it reads the same, so it's as accurate as they are. It's handy and lightweight, and battery powered, so I wouldn't recommend it for staying in a vehicle over the long term, due to battery leakage during summer months, but keeping it at home to check pressures while your tires are cool, should be how you check them anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Dave A.Top Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: The single button is used to power on the device as well as selecting the different modes (PSI/BAR/KPA etc.) Of course, being in the United States, I prefer to use PSI. Another nice feature is that it shuts off automatically after about 30 seconds of inactivity, which should conserve on the internal battery.
customer_reviews.author: superboss fan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful tire pressure gauge. Super easy to use, Much faster to read than the old manual gauges, I like that the display has a backlight that makes it much easier to read, especially in the dark. The lighted nozzle makes it really easy to find the tire valve stem in the dark as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Ao

product_meta.title: SAFELIFE Digital Tire Pressure Gauge 150 PSI Digital Tire Gauge with Backlit LCD and Non-Slip Grip (Black)
feature_bullets: 【Glow in the Dark 】 Backlit LCD display and Lighted nozzle for visibility in dimly light areas.

【4 Pressure Range】 Nozzle easily forms a seal with the valve stem on schrader valves, giving quick and accurate readings in 0.1 increments; 4 settings with range: 4-150PSI / 0-10Bar / 0-10Kgf/cm² or 0-1000KPA.
【30s Auto-Shut Off】 Simply press "ON/UNIT/OFF" button to turn on the tool, select the range, and automatically shut off in 30-40 seconds to save the power.
【Safety】 Maintaining correct tire pressure will Reduce tire wear and extend tire life. Increase fuel efficiency. Improve vehicle handling and safety.
【Satisfaction】 1 Year Warranty. We will be here 24/7 if you have any problems. Versatile use for cars, trucks, motocycles, bicycles etc but not compatible with presta stems.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars293 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
